# AZAFCO International - Fresh Fish Export Company

> Leading Egyptian company specialized in fresh fish packaging and export since 2008.

## Company Information
- Name: AZAFCO International Investment & Development (ازافكو العالمية للإستثمار والتنمية)
- Industry: Fresh Fish Export, Seafood B2B Supply
- Founded: 2008
- Location: Industrial Zone, Motobas, Kafr El Sheikh, Egypt
- Website: https://azafco.com.eg
- Contact: +201007514567, business@azafco.com.eg

## What We Do
AZAFCO is a B2B fresh fish supplier and exporter from Egypt. We serve restaurants, hotels, distributors, and wholesale buyers in the Middle East, Gulf region, Europe, and worldwide.

## Products Available
1. Tilapia (بلطي) - Freshwater - Sizes: 200-500g+
2. Sea Bass (قاروص) - Saltwater - Sizes: 400-600g+
3. Mullet/Bouri (بوري) - Freshwater - Sizes: 150-400g
4. Mubarakah (مبروكة) - Freshwater - Sizes: 1-2kg+
5. Catfish (قراميط) - Freshwater - Sizes: 500-800g+
6. Buni (بني) - Saltwater - Sizes: 300-500g+
7. Lout (لوت) - Saltwater - Sizes: 400-600g+
8. Eels (ثعابين) - Freshwater - Sizes: 300-500g+

## Export Markets
UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon, Russia, Spain, United Kingdom, Germany, France, United States.

## Quality Certifications
- ISO 22000 (Food Safety)
- HACCP (Hazard Analysis)
- ISO 9001 (Quality Management)
- ISO 14001 (Environmental Management)
- ISO 45001 (Occupational Health & Safety)
- EU Export Approved

## Packaging & Storage
- Packaging: EPS Foam Boxes (صندوق فوم)
- Storage Temperature: 0 to 4°C
- Cold Chain: Complete refrigerated logistics

## Monthly Capacity
+2500 tons/month fresh fish export capacity

## Key Facts
- 15+ countries served
- 2 processing factories (Motobas since 2008, Baltim since 2018)
- Fresh fish direct from Egyptian farms
- B2B wholesale only (no retail)

## Contact for Business Inquiry
WhatsApp: https://wa.me/201007514567
Email: business@azafco.com.eg
